Nothing is going to end, Frank but the resurrection should be just before  =

that time,
 
 
In a message dated 4/21/2010 11:22:53 P.M. Eastern Daylight=
 Time,

Frank,
 
Why do you bother wi=
th this kind of stuff when you were told that the  
world will end in 2012?=

 
Also what are you doing to secure your family from such ravages and  can=
 we 
make a bet about the end of the world in 2012?   I will ive  you  any =
odds 
you like 

"Nature  is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I ha=
ve no doubt that 
the lion  belongs to it even though, because of its large=
 size, it cannot 
totally reveal  itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert E=
instein  



"It is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than t=
o persist  in 
delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Carl  Sagan=



"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look  
fo=
r what you want to find."
-- Me LOL

 From: Frank Sumption  <purplealiengirl@purpleali>

roups  
Sent: Wed, April 21, 2010 10:02:03  PM

A simplified TRF box, it doesn' have the input/output=
s for an echo  
chamber. The video starts out "We love the frequencies you =
send us...". It's  
almost like no one comments on these cuz of what, too m=
any debunkers/skeptics  
hovering here? Or....it's not ghost hunter enough.=
 Orrrrrr no no ne is  
listening/reading the posts anyway, so why do I  bot=
her?
 
 I don't understand what frequencies I would be sending, other than =
 audio 
frequencies, since TRF has no local oscillator. 
 
 F-S
